keyMoments.moment: Zoro and Robin fight against Enel but are defeated
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew facing an overwhelming opponent, building tension for Luffy's eventual confrontation

keyMoments.moment: Wyper uses Seastone and Reject Dial to defeat Enel
keyMoments.significance: The Shandia warriors' ultimate weapon and strategy pays off, temporarily defeating the god of Skypiea

keyMoments.moment: Flashback shows young Wyper and Shandia children learning about their ancestral duty
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the generational motivation driving the Shandia's 400-year war
